page.title: 17A NURSING HOME
page.content: COMPTON VIEW has 14 old people.The supervisers are part-time and are paid Â£1.50 and above an hour.They work from 8pm to 8am.The day supervisers are also cooks and usually there are 3 of them.Two extensions have been added since the home opened in 1982. Twenty staff are employed.The old people pay a staggering Â£5,500 a year.An example of a night supervisers work:_ Arrive 8pm;check what work has to be done;help the old people to bed;every so often check that everything is OK;clean the kitchen shelves and floor;peel potatoes and prepare other vegetables;and some nights load tumble driers and do the ironing.
